sections.heading: One switch does one thing (press and release)
sections.body: Participate in show and tell, choose an item that you enjoy or has a cool story behind and tell your friends all about it.

sections.heading: What you'll need
sections.body:
Record a message onto a BIGMack talking switch that tells us all about their show and tell item.

Plug one of my switches into the BIGMack and position my switch so I can use it.
